desc: Bandana Beach is the proud USA manufacturer of the Bandana Blanket. The lightest weight 100% American cotton blanket is made from a total of 16 (22inch by 22inch) patchwork bandanas. Each blanket is unique and will last a lifetime. Free Shipping. 60-day returns. The happiest blanket ever made.

layout.text:
The Happiest Blanket in the world
Sleep Better. Live Better. Be Happy.
Shop
One of the softest blankets that will ever touch your body
It's not high-tech it is pure American cotton
